title: Dark Souls 3: Deluxe Edition [v 1.15 + 2 DLC]
description:
Release date: April 12, 2016
Genre: RPG, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Developer: From Software
Publisher: Bandai Namco

Language: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, Korean

The repack is based on the ISO image Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City-CODEX: codex-dark.souls.iii.the.ringed.city.iso
Installed the update Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City.Update.v1.13-CODEX (254 MB), Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City.Update.v1.14-CODEX (135 MB) and Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City.Update.v1.15-CODEX (137 MB)
100% Lossless and MD5 Perfect: all files after installation are identical to the original release with a bit precision
NOTHING is carved, NOTHING recoded
Version of the game: v1.15, rules v1.35; installed and activated 
DLC: Ashes of Ariandel and The Ringed City
Bonus game soundtrack in MP3 format
Installation takes: ~ 35 minutes on 8 cores; ~ 50 minutes on 4 cores; ~ 1 hour 30 minutes on 2 cores
After installation, the game takes up to 25 GB
After installation, the option to check the checksums of all files is available to make sure that the repack is installed correctly
To change the language, use "Language Selector.exe" in the "Game" folder of the game

How to install:
Mount and install
Play
